contents.text: Welcome to App Annie in San Francisco, the standard in app analytics and market data.
Press 1 for sales and account information.
Press 1 for demo requests and pricing.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative for demo requests and pricing.

navigationGoals: Arrange a demo of the platform and discuss pricing plans
Schedule a demo of App Annie’s analytics platform for my veteran-led app and get pricing details.
Schedule an in-depth demo of the analytics platform and get detailed pricing tiers and feature breakdown.
I need help scheduling a demo and finding out how much it costs.
I’d like an academic demo and pricing estimate for using App Annie in my research data analysis.

contents.text: Press 2 for billing and subscription questions.
Please hold while we connect you to the billing team for subscription inquiries.

navigationGoals: Resolve a question about my subscription billing and charges
Inquire about my current subscription invoice and any available veteran discount.
Upgrade my enterprise subscription and clarify the next billing cycle dates and overage fees.
I need help understanding my subscription charges and renewing my plan.
I need information on student subscription billing options and how to pay.

contents.text: Press 2 for technical support and troubleshooting.
Press 1 for reporting service outages or errors.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical team regarding service outages.

navigationGoals: Report a current service outage affecting my analytics dashboard
Report that I’m seeing an outage when trying to access my analytics dashboard.
Verify the current service outage status for the analytics API and request an estimated resolution timeline.
I need to report that my app appears to be down and get assistance restoring service.
I’m encountering errors fetching analytics data—are there any current service outages?

contents.text: Press 2 for API integration and developer support.
Please hold while we connect you to our developers for API integration support.

navigationGoals: Get help with integrating App Annie’s API into our systems
Get help integrating App Annie’s API into my custom analytics system.
Discuss integrating App Annie’s API into our data pipeline and troubleshoot OAuth authentication errors.
I need help setting up the API integration for my app.
I need assistance integrating the App Annie API into my Python scripts for my physics project.
